content: **about this design** the bayswater top is a perfect breezy layer for summer easy filet crochet stitches combined with fun texture makes this pattern fun to work up and even more fun to wear you can purchase an inexpensive pdf to support my work read below **about this pattern** crochet your own bayswater top using this crochet pattern in pdf format the finished sizes and measurements are measurements xs sm med lg 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x bust 28 30 32 34 36 38 40 42 44 46 48 50 52 54 56 58 60 62 *size small shown this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the printable pdf has a total of 6 pages including the cover page available as an instant download **questions & returns** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern **please note ** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns **you can find the free version here ** https //www cococrochetlee com/post/bayswater-top-free-crochet-pattern/ 1 **find me on social media** patterns https //www cococrochetlee com 2 instagram https //www instagram com/coco crochet lee 3 facebook https //www facebook com/cococrochetlee 4 pinterest https //www pinterest com/cococrochetlee 5 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucur9g37am0rlp-ref1x7gsg 6 1 https //www cococrochetlee com/post/bayswater-top-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //www cococrochetlee com 3 https //www instagram com/coco crochet lee 4 https //www facebook com/cococrochetlee 5 https //www pinterest com/cococrochetlee 6 https //www youtube com/channel/ucur9g37am0rlp-ref1x7gsg
